sources.title: Touchdown Demons (1940)
sources.description: The car of a male and female mouse breaks down en route to a football match. A cat in a sleek roadster takes her, leaving the male behind. At the game, both join in a Cats vs. Mice contest, the latter winning. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/touchdown-demons-1940/

metadata.Plot: The car of a male and female mouse breaks down en route to a football match. A cat in a sleek roadster takes her, leaving the male behind. At the game, both join in a Cats vs. Mice contest, the latter winning.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
